exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description: Standard push-up with hands shoulder-width apart, lowering body until chest nearly touches the floor.

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, lower body by bending knees and pushing hips back, then return to standing.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: Hold a push-up position with arms straight, maintaining a straight line from head to heels.

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.description: Lie on a bench and press a barbell or dumbbells up and down from chest level.

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.description: Lift a barbell from the ground to hip level while maintaining a straight back.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.description: Step forward with one leg, lowering hips until both knees are bent at 90-degree angles, then return and repeat with other leg.

exercises.name: Pull-ups
exercises.description: Hang from a bar with palms facing away, pull body up until chin is above the bar.

exercises.name: Shoulder Press
exercises.description: Press weights from shoulder height directly upward until arms are fully extended.

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.description: Sit with knees bent and feet off the ground, twist torso from side to side, touching the ground beside hips.

exercises.name: Bicep Curls
exercises.description: Curl weights from a hanging position at your sides to shoulder level, keeping elbows close to body.

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.description: Support body with hands on a bench or chair, lower body by bending elbows, then push back up.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: From a push-up position, alternate bringing knees toward chest in a running motion.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown
exercises.description: Pull a cable attachment from overhead down to chest level while seated.

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.description: Push weight away from body using legs while seated in a leg press machine.

exercises.name: Crunches
exercises.description: Lie on back with knees bent, lift shoulders toward knees by contracting abdominals.
